ValidationRule.description: Validate org number to specific formats for NO, SE and DK. Accept any format for any other country
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF(ISBLANK(Org_number__c), false, IF((ISPICKVAL(Country__c, "Norway") && (!ISNUMBER(Org_number__c) || LEN(Org_number__c)!=9)), true, IF((ISPICKVAL(Country__c, "Sweden") && (FIND("-",Org_number__c)!=7 || !ISNUMBER(SUBSTITUTE(Org_number__c,"-","")) || LEN(Org_number__c)!=11 || LEN(SUBSTITUTE(Org_number__c,"-",""))!=10)), true, IF((ISPICKVAL(Country__c, "Denmark") && (!ISNUMBER(Org_number__c) || LEN(Org_number__c)!=8)), true,
false ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Org number must be in this format: NO: 9 pos. numeric, DK: 8 pos. numeric, SE: 6 pos. numeric + "-" + 4 pos. numeric. No space characters allowed.
